commands: sed -i "s/^version:.*/version: $(grep '^version:' Chart.yaml | awk '{print $2}' | awk -F '[."]' '{$NF = $NF + 1;} 1' | sed 's/ /./g')/" Chart.yaml

allowedPostUpgradeCommands: sed -i "s/^version:.*/version: $(grep '^version:' Chart.yaml | awk '{print $2}' | awk -F '[."]' '{$NF = $NF + 1;} 1' | sed 's/ /./g')/" Chart.yaml
